title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction; Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Knowledge Based Expert Systems (KBES); AI techniques, Development of KBES using knowledge engineering; AI languages and Programming Environments; Expert Systems Shells; An Overview of KBES in Structural Engineering; KBES applications to Structural Analysis; Design and Diagnostics Problems; Advances in knowledge engineering.
